captions.text: This week’s Music Monday will have you
lounging on couches like Victorian women,
with 2NE1’s “I Love You”
Let’s begin by saying how much we like this song
It’s a great song
It's not my favourite 2NE1’s song ever,
because when I heard the bombastic  glory of “I Am The Best”
that was a game changer right there
probably the best song YG ever made
At least favourite song by 2NE1 was Ugly,
because that song was kind of bit meh ...
This song, though,
lands somewhere in between a 2NE1 ballad and bombast track
It has the vibe of a serious ballad
but it also has a rockingly awesome beat with great synths
It almost  the best of both sides of 2NE1
merged into one track
And it would dig in to your brain and make sing it all day
ALL
FREAKING
DAY
Ok there’s something really freaky about the chorus for us
Really freaky
I don't know what kind of subliminal hypnotoad
hynospudgy message is going on in this song
but for whatever reason, when one of us sing this song
even if we are not singing it out loud
the other would start singing it
AT EXACT SAME TIME
OUT LOUD
WITHOUT HAVING EVER HEARD THE PERSON SINGING IT
I don't know if this ever happened to you yet
but it's a really freaky experience
I said yah yah yah yah yah
Damn it woman, get out of my head
I was singing that song first
Are you taking a poop?
No
Close the door
And the part that we catch ourselves singing all the time
is not the main chorus,
oh no,
but the part with CL’s snack food addiction
SARANG NORAE
MARTINA WE HAVE BULL OH JERKY EVERY DAY!
I SAID
NUM NUM NUM NUM
Now, first off CL,
I can assure you Martina has never tried this bull jerky you speak of
I don’t even know what this bull jerky is
I’m used to beef jerky, which is made from regular cows
but I guess if you’re 2NE1 you’re probably ballin
Hanging out with WILL.I.AM and all
And so you can afford that fancy pants bull jerky
that regular folks such as  myself can’t afford
Whatever you do
Don’t lose your roots, 2NE1
REMEMBER WHERE YOU CAME FROM!!!
THE HOOD
in Korea
wherever that is
It's no where
AND WHO DECIDED TO  RUIN THAT SEXY CAT SUIT WITH A TURTLE NECK ON THE TOP
GORT DAMN WHAT’S IT WITH KPOP AND TURTLE NECKS
Against them!!
Grumpy
Side note: did anyone else notice that the dubbing was horribly off in the music video?
The same thing happened in Ugly,
so either YG’s doing it on purpose,
or someone needs to get fired
Maybe you guys didn't notice this at all
but it's just because we edit videos everyday
and we're particular about this
But some of this kinda kinda obvious
Like, their mouths weren’t even saying the matching word.
I mean when your lips don't move in sync with the audio,
and you feel like you’re going crazy when you watch it
Just check the 1:13 second mark
when Minzi is under the umbrella,
or the 1:35 second mark with Park Bom’s lips moving a lot more than the words would suggest
Or 2:44 when CL is at the lighthouse and her lips are WAYYYYY OFF
What is she even saying?
What song is she singing?
IT DRIVES US MENTAL!
We would never make that kind of mistake
Apart from the bad audio synchronization,
we don’t have any complaints with this video
The setting of the video has a really cool vibe
that we can’t even place
It’s almost like it belongs in an anime
It’s got a really cool retro London meets China feel to it
And the addition of the sadly slow falling fluffy snow
also give a really mystic feel to it
It really almost looked like a a studio Ghibli movie come to life
We’re happy that the video also directly reflects the lyrics
The song is about 2NE1 being in love with someone
and they’re really upset because that person isn’t returning their phone calls
and they are getting really jealous and upset
that somebody else might be in the picture
And so, you see the girls looking lonely in different places
hanging up the unanswered phone sadly in the phone booth,
or stretched across the bed lying sadly like Disney princess
waiting their phone to ring
I mean, that makes sense right?
I just don't really get why you are on a train
Maybe you are sending out like batsignals to your boyfriend?
UNLESS!!!
Yes Of course it’s so obvious!
CL and Park Bom are in love with alaskan fishermen
who have gone off to sea
and yet to return a phone  calls.
The crabs are getting away
oh..jesus
not now,CL
I'm busy
OH NO !!!
The Kraken is back
Sailmen!!
Sail hard
OOH But wait!
Would that mean...that with the travelling on the trains,
that they might be in love with wizards!!?
Not now, Dara
I'm fighting the dark lord
Nah, probably just used for cool settings
Nothing says cool like a light house
[the dance]
There wasn’t a prominent dance for this video
except for CL’s
like whoa
what she doing there with the big heels girl
Which I shan’t be imitating,
but near the end of the music video
they break out into totally badass kung fu style animal poses
What? you haven't notice that?
[The English]
As for the English of the song,
I’m gonna give this a 4 out of 5.
That’s right.
A less than perfect rating for English for a YG song
Now, it’s not that there’s mispronunciation or anything
It’s all really great
I’m just really annoyed by the beginning of the song
When you feel like there’s no way out...
Love is the only way.
Is this poetry or something?
Or is this a profound understanding of love?
I don’t get it.
I’ve been in love with my wife for a long time now
And this doesn’t make sense to me whatsoever
Love is the only way...what?
Love is the only way out?
I’m not sure how that would work:
Darn!! I’ve crazy glued my fingers together again
There’s no way out of here
What am I going to do?
Don't worry, love will save you
WOW!
I'm free
Actually I'm not...
OH GOD..
I'm finally free
Love is great
Sorry 2NE1,
I'm not docking you marks for grammar, mispronunciation
Your lyrics just confuse me
4 out of 5
[The Showdown]
For last week's board game edition
We asked you who you rather play board games with
Bingo with Super Junior
or Clue with SHINEE
And the winner was
It was really close
But Super Junior just beat up SHINEE like 300 points or so
It's a tough one
Simon, who would you prefer?
For this week's snack battle edition
we ask you whose snacks you'd rather eat
Taemin’s Doritos
or CL’s Jerky.
Yes we know
we are doing SHINEE two weeks in a row
but it was just so appropriate
Maybe this time they'll win
Leave your votes on the comment
or on our Facebook poll
And we'll announce the winner next week
If there is a video you want us to review it for next week's Music Monday
head on to K-POP charts  eatyourkimichi.com/kpopcharts
but I beg of you
VOTE FOR PSY
It is the greatest music video
in the universe
Sexy~ Lady
All the wins for ZE:A's contest winners
don't forget to check it in our blooper footage
That's where we are going to announce the CD giveaway winners
and lastly
don't forget to like it and favorite this video
and to subscribe for more Music Mondays
Take it away, sexy Spudgy
undefined
